item.description:
Let's join the New Haven Dining Group for some fun and Karaoke at Olde School Saloon and Bistro!!

We had such a great time here that we decided to go again.

The newly-opened Olde School Saloon and Bistro (418 State St.; 203-772-0544, oldeschoolsaloonandbistro.com) nods to New Haven nostalgia with its vintage copper-top bar, historical Hullâ€™s Beer signs, 1946 beer cooler and play-your-own vinyl record collection. The owner's play a nice mix of music from the 70's and 80's.

Tuesdays they offer $5.00 Stoli Drinks along with $5.00 small plates...though there is nothing small about them!!! Their Crabmeat Stuffed Mushrooms are to die for as are the Gourmet Nachos covered in Italian sausage, Gorgonzola, mozzarella, cheddar, and hot peppers; Spicy Peel and Eat shrimp,three different types of wings, I could go and on...enough to say that the food and drink are great! The atmosphere delightful and the owners attentive and fun!!

group.name: PartyExpress !! Let's Get Together and have Fun!

item.name: Karaoke @ Olde School Saloon and Bistro
